notesStmt.note: Half-title: The Bishop of Bath and Wells's fast-day sermon before the Queen at White-Hall on the 23d of May, 1694.
Running title: A fast-sermon preached before the Queen at White-Hall.
This item appears at reel 499:18 as Wing K408, and at reel 1741:39 as Wing (2nd ed.) K416A.
Reproduction of originals in Bristol Public Library, Bristol (England), and in Huntington Library.
